name: Space God
description: Space God is a 'hyper retro neon' style top-down shooting game. Play in single player, online co-op mode, or online multiplayer. Don't stop, keep moving! and you might survive... maybe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or higher Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-Core CPU or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 400 series or better (1GB VRAM required) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 256 MB available space
